alert.note: Alert for Linn; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 8:25AM CDT until March 31 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Miami County in east central Kansas... Linn County in east central Kansas... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 824 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Parker, or 9 miles southeast of Garnett, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Louisburg, Pleasanton, La Cygne, Mound City, Linn Valley, Parker, Fontana, New Lancaster and Beagle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
